actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry (without written report).
Referred to Senate Committee on the Budget.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Budget, S. Rept. 95-1026.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution waiving section 303(a)(4) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 3085, a bill to extend and amend the special supplemental food program and the child care food program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 3085 (Child care food program extension).

titles.title: A resolution waiving section 303(a)(4) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 3085, a bill to extend and amend the special supplemental food program and the child care food program, and for other purposes.
